Wolfblade stopped for a second. "Hey, Malice, hold on a nanosec."
She knealed down and looked at Elita. "Hey there young pup. What are 
you doing here?"  She closed her optics at how stupid that sounded. 
She was never good with young bots. And this was going to be a 
challange for her.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Elita::
> 
> Elita continue giggling and trying to reach Wolfblade
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > Wolfblade:
> > 
> > She smiled and shook her head. "Oh sure. I understand. We all get 
> > that way sometimes. No hard feelings pal. Besides, I'm glad your 
> on 
> > our side. We need a strong sparked fighter like you on our team. 
> Glad 
> > to have you as a friend."  She smiled and shook his paw.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "bustercross365" 
> <bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Malice found a computer terminal and began accessing it.  He 
> pulled 
> > > up an inventory, and looked for the neccesary items for his 
> plan.  
> > He 
> > > found there was a sufficent supplies.  He then checked the 
> conduits 
> > > to see if he could use the interface. Satisfied, he found he 
had 
> > free 
> > > time, so he felt it would time to apologize to Wolfblade.
> > > "Hey Wolfblade?  I want to say I'm sorry for earlier.  I was 
> > hungrey 
> > > and iratible.  I had no reason to get in a huff.  Sorry."
> > > He extended his clawed hand, to shake and make up. 
> > > 
> > >

> of

> > > >

> > with

> > > > 
> > > > DeathStar thinks oiver everything that has been said.
